attributes.action: Include Covid booster vaccinations on the NHS Covid pass.
attributes.additional_details: Ensure the NHS modifies its Covid Passport to include 3rd, 4th and subsequent boosters and, if necessary, delete older vaccinations from its record.
attributes.background: Other countries are beginning to limit the length of time Covid vaccination is valid. When travelling we will need to prove we have had appropriate vaccination recently or within a specific time scale.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see changes to the NHS COVID Pass, but we're not sure exactly what changes you'd like the Government to make. It's not clear if you only want the NHS COVID Pass to be available to people who have had a booster, or something else.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
